sentences.en: Diagnosis was deferred pending further assessment.
sentences.cn: 等候进一步的评估再诊断.

sentences.en: Heggie was remanded to a mental hospital for assessment by doctors.
sentences.cn: 赫吉被押往一所精神病院接受医生检查。

sentences.en: His assessment of the situation was spot on.
sentences.cn: 他对形势的判断完全准确。

sentences.en: Needs assessment is crucial if the hospital is to deliver effective health care.
sentences.cn: 医院要提供有效的卫生保健,需求评估是关键.

sentences.en: The Defense Secretary gave an upbeat assessment of the war so far.
sentences.cn: 国防部长对目前的战事给予了乐观的评价。

sentences.en: The euphoria is giving way to a more sober assessment of the situation.
sentences.cn: 兴高采烈的情绪不见了，取而代之的是对局面更为清醒的认识。

sentences.en: The witness's demeanor in testifying provides useful guidance in making this assessment.
sentences.cn: 证人作证时的举止为作出上述判断提供了有用的指导.

sentences.en: There is little assessment of the damage to the natural environment.
sentences.cn: 几乎未对自然环境破坏程度作出评估。

sentences.en: This was an uncharitable assessment of the reasons for the failure.
sentences.cn: 这是对失败原因毫不讲情面的分析评估。

sentences.en: What is your assessment of the situation?
sentences.cn: 你对时局的看法 如何 ?
